name: sodomite

a word, usually used as an insult, for a person who practises sodomy (= anal sex): a military man who was convicted of being gay (a sodomite, as it was then called) See
sodomy
More examplesFewer examplesHis lover described him as "a liberal and a sodomite". Falwell referred to gays and lesbians as "deviants" and "sodomites".Paul's letter to the Corinthians states that fornicators, sodomites and idolaters won't be admitted into the kingdom of heaven.
